usage.title: How to Use

management.title: Managing Favorites

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Empower you to make informed, healthier food choices with every scan.
Provide instant, science-backed nutrition insights through cutting-edge AI technology.
Transform complex food data into clear, actionable health guidance.
Promote better eating habits through comprehensive product analysis and health tracking.

howItWorks.title: How Was2Eat Works
items: Scan any food barcode to instantly access comprehensive nutrition analysis from our OpenFoodFacts database.
Get dual scoring with official Nutri-Score (A-E rating) plus our proprietary AI-enhanced Health Score (0-100).
Receive detailed additive safety analysis using official EFSA data combined with AI assessment.
Compare products side-by-side to find healthier alternatives that match your dietary preferences.
Track your daily nutrition intake with our advanced Health Tracker and see your progress over time.
Build shopping baskets and save products to favorites for easy reference and better meal planning.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
items: Real-time barcode scanning with instant product recognition and analysis.
AI-powered additive safety evaluation using European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) guidelines.
Comprehensive nutrition breakdown including proteins, fats, carbohydrates, fiber, and energy content.
Smart product comparison tools with visual charts and detailed nutritional breakdowns.
Health Tracker with daily, weekly, and monthly nutrition monitoring and goal tracking.
Shopping Basket feature to save and organize products for better meal planning.
Personalized favorites list and scan history for quick product access.
Multilingual support (English, German, French, Turkish) with easy language switching.
Offline-ready favorites list for shopping without internet connection.
Advanced filtering and sorting options for better product discovery.

dataTransparency.title: Data Sources & Accuracy
items: Product information sourced from OpenFoodFacts, the world's largest collaborative food database.
Additive safety data directly from EFSA (European Food Safety Authority) official assessments.
AI enhancement fills gaps in official data using established regulatory patterns and scientific literature.
All AI-generated content is clearly labeled and distinguished from official regulatory data.
Regular database updates ensure you get the most current product information available.
Continuous algorithm improvements based on user feedback and new scientific research.

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
items: Your data is never sold, shared, or used for advertising purposes.
Account creation is optional - you can use core scanning features without signing up.
Complete control over your data with easy deletion options in account settings.
Health tracking data is stored securely and only accessible to you.
No tracking of personal eating habits or dietary patterns without explicit consent.
GDPR compliant with full transparency about data collection and use.

technology.title: Powered by AI
items: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze additive interactions and health impacts.
Proprietary health scoring system combining nutrition, additives, and processing levels.
Natural language processing converts complex regulatory data into easy-to-understand summaries.
Continuous learning from global food safety databases improves accuracy over time.
Transparent AI labeling ensures you always know when content is AI-enhanced vs. official data.
Real-time nutrition calculations and personalized health recommendations.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
items: Download Was2Eat from your app store (iOS or Android)
No account required - start scanning immediately after installation
Allow camera permissions for barcode scanning functionality
Optional: Create an account with email or Google for cloud sync
Start scanning products to see instant nutrition analysis and health scores

scanning.title: Scanning and Analysis
items: Point your camera at any product barcode and hold steady
Ensure good lighting for accurate barcode recognition
View dual scoring: Official Nutri-Score (A-E) and AI Health Score (0-100)
Get detailed nutrition breakdown including additives and allergens
Save products to favorites for quick access during shopping
Use the comparison mode to compare multiple products side-by-side
Add products to your shopping basket for meal planning

healthTracker.title: Health Tracker
items: Track your daily nutrition intake by marking products as consumed
Monitor calories, proteins, carbs, fats, fiber, and other nutrients
View progress with daily, weekly, and monthly analytics
Set nutrition goals and track your progress over time
Visualize your data with interactive charts and graphs
Get insights into your eating patterns and nutrition trends

features.title: Key Features Explained
items: Health Score: Our AI algorithm evaluates nutrition, additives, and processing levels
Additive Safety: Get clear warnings about potentially harmful food additives
Product Comparison: Compare up to multiple products to find the healthiest option
Shopping Baskets: Organize products for meal planning and grocery shopping
Favorites: Save frequently purchased products for quick access
History: View your recent scans and track your product discovery journey
Filters: Sort products by health score, nutrients, or dietary preferences

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
items: If barcode won't scan: Clean your camera lens and ensure good lighting
For scanning issues: Try different angles or manual barcode entry
If product not found: Some products may not be in our database yet
For app crashes: Restart the app and ensure you have the latest version
Connection issues: Check your internet connection for real-time data
Performance issues: Close other apps and restart Was2Eat
Contact us at info@was2eat.com for persistent technical problems

account.title: Account and Data Management
items: Account creation is optional - use core features without signing up
Create account to sync data across devices and access cloud features
Update your profile information and preferences in Settings
View and manage your scanning history and favorites
Change language settings (English, German, French, Turkish)
Export your data by contacting info@was2eat.com
Delete your account and all data through Settings if needed

privacy.title: Privacy and Data
items: Your scanning data is private and never sold to third parties
Health tracking data is stored securely and only accessible to you
We follow GDPR guidelines for all data collection and processing
Camera is only used for scanning - no images are stored
You can delete all your data at any time through account settings

support.title: Getting Help and Support
items: Check this Help Center for answers to common questions
Contact our support team at info@was2eat.com
Report bugs or suggest new features through the app
Follow us on social media for app updates and nutrition tips
Join our community to share experiences and get advice
Rate and review the app to help us improve

introduction.title: 1. Introduction and Acceptance
items: Welcome to Was2Eat, a mobile application that provides food nutrition analysis, additive safety information, and health guidance through barcode scanning technology.
These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of the Was2Eat mobile application ('App', 'Service') operated by Was2Eat ('we', 'us', 'our').
By downloading, installing, or using Was2Eat, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our App.
We may update these Terms periodically, and continued use constitutes acceptance of any changes.
You must be at least 13 years old to use Was2Eat, or have parental consent if younger.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
items: Was2Eat provides food product analysis by scanning barcodes and retrieving data from OpenFoodFacts and other public food databases.
Our App offers nutrition information, additive safety assessments, and personalized health recommendations.
We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to provide health scores and dietary guidance.
Product information is sourced from third-party databases and may not always be complete or current.
Was2Eat is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical or nutritional advice.
We continuously work to improve our database and analysis accuracy.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities and Acceptable Use
items: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You must provide accurate information when creating your account.
You may use Was2Eat only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
You agree not to misuse our services, attempt to hack our systems, or interfere with other users.
You may not use automated systems to access our App without permission.
Commercial use of our data or services requires separate written permission from Was2Eat.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
items: The Was2Eat App, including its design, algorithms, AI models, and proprietary health scoring system, is owned by Was2Eat and protected by intellectual property laws.
You may not copy, modify, distribute, or reverse engineer any part of our App.
Product data from third-party sources remains subject to their respective licenses.
You retain ownership of any personal data you provide to us.
Our trademarks, logos, and brand elements may not be used without permission.
We respect intellectual property rights and expect users to do the same.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy and Data Protection
items: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on data collection and use.
We collect minimal personal information necessary to provide our services.
Your scanning history and preferences are stored securely and used to improve your experience.
We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
You have rights to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. Contact us at info@was2eat.com for data requests.
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information.

disclaimers.title: 6. Disclaimers and Limitations
items: Was2Eat is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, express or implied, including accuracy, completeness, or fitness for a particular purpose.
We do not guarantee that product information is always current, complete, or error-free.
Health recommendations are general guidance and should not replace professional medical advice.
We are not liable for decisions made based on information provided by our App.
Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
We disclaim responsibility for third-party content and external links.

termination.title: 7. Account Termination
items: You may delete your account at any time through the App settings.
We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.
Upon termination, your access to the App will cease, but these Terms remain in effect for applicable provisions.
We will retain some information as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.
Termination does not affect any rights or obligations that arose before termination.

governing.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
items: These Terms are governed by the laws of Estonia, without regard to conflict of law principles.
Any disputes arising from these Terms or use of Was2Eat will be resolved in Estonian courts.
If any provision of these Terms is found invalid, the remaining provisions continue in effect.
These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Was2Eat regarding use of our App.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
items: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time.
Significant changes to these Terms will be communicated through the App or via email with at least 30 days advance notice.
Your continued use of Was2Eat after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
We encourage you to review these Terms periodically.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information and Support
items: For questions about these Terms, contact us at info@was2eat.com or through the App's support section.
For privacy-related inquiries or data requests, contact info@was2eat.com.
For technical support or app issues, use the Help Center within the App or contact info@was2eat.com.
Mailing address: Sepapaja tn 6, 15551 Tallinn, Harju Maakond, Estonia
We aim to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours during business days.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction and Data Controller
items: This Privacy Policy explains how Was2Eat ('we', 'us', 'our') collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
Was2Eat is the data controller for personal information collected through our mobile application.
This policy applies to all users of the Was2Eat mobile application.
By using our App, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.
We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data responsibly.
Contact us at info@was2eat.com for any privacy-related questions.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
items: Account information: Email, name, and profile details when you create an account
Usage data: Products scanned, search queries, and app interaction patterns
Device information: Device type, operating system, and app version for technical support
Location data: Only if you grant permission, used for regional product recommendations
Camera access: Only for barcode scanning functionality, images are not stored
We do not collect sensitive health data or detailed personal dietary information

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide personalized nutrition analysis and health recommendations
Improve our product database and recommendation algorithms
Send important updates about the App and your account
Provide customer support and respond to your inquiries
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience and app performance
Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights and users' safety

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
items: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties
We may share anonymized, aggregated data for research and improvement purposes
We use trusted service providers who help us operate our App under strict confidentiality agreements
We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and users' safety
In case of business transfer, user data may be transferred under the same privacy protections
We will notify users of any significant changes to our data sharing practices

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights and Choices
items: Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
Correction: Update or correct inaccurate personal information
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal requirements
Portability: Request your data in a portable format
Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
Contact info@was2eat.com to exercise any of these rights

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention and Security
items: We retain personal data only as long as necessary to provide our services
Account data is deleted within 30 days of account deletion request
Usage data may be retained in anonymized form for service improvement
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data
Data is encrypted in transit and at rest using appropriate technologies
We regularly review and update our security practices

contact.title: 7. Contact Information
items: For privacy questions or data requests: info@was2eat.com
To report privacy concerns: info@was2eat.com
Mailing address: Sepapaja tn 6, 15551 Tallinn, Harju Maakond, Estonia
We respond to privacy inquiries within 30 days as required by applicable law
You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

version.title: Version Information
items: Current Version: 2.0.0
Release Date: 2024
Platform: iOS and Android
Bundle ID: com.was2eat.app
Minimum Requirements: iOS 12.0+ / Android 8.0+
Last Updated: Check your app store for latest updates

features.title: Core Features
items: Advanced barcode scanning for instant product analysis
Dual scoring system: Official Nutri-Score (A-E) + AI Health Score (0-100)
Comprehensive nutrition breakdown with detailed macro and micronutrient analysis
AI-powered additive safety assessment using EFSA guidelines
Health Tracker with daily, weekly, and monthly nutrition monitoring
Shopping Basket feature for meal planning and grocery organization
Smart product comparison with side-by-side nutritional analysis
Product favorites list with offline access
Scan history with automatic organization and cleanup
Advanced filtering and sorting for better product discovery
Multi-language support (English, German, French, Turkish)
Optional account system with Google authentication

healthAnalysis.title: Health Analysis & Scoring
items: Proprietary AI health scoring algorithm (0-100 scale)
Comprehensive evaluation of nutrition quality, processing level, and additive safety
Real-time analysis of proteins, fats, carbohydrates, fiber, sugars, and sodium
Trans fat and saturated fat assessment with health impact warnings
Additive risk evaluation with clear safety classifications
Allergen detection and warnings for common dietary restrictions
NOVA food processing classification for ultra-processed food identification
Personalized dietary recommendations based on scan history

dataSources.title: Data Sources and Accuracy
items: Product data sourced from OpenFoodFacts and verified manufacturer databases
Official nutrition information from product labels and regulatory filings
Additive safety data from EFSA (European Food Safety Authority)
Additional regulatory data from FDA, JECFA, and Codex Alimentarius
Enhanced additive database with over 400 food additives and safety assessments
AI-generated content clearly labeled and distinguished from official data
Database continuously updated with new products and regulatory changes
We strive for accuracy but recommend verifying critical information for severe allergies

technology.title: Technology and Innovation
items: Advanced barcode recognition using machine learning algorithms
AI-powered nutrition analysis with real-time health scoring
Cloud-based data processing for instant results and updates
Secure infrastructure with end-to-end encryption for user data
Cross-platform React Native development for iOS and Android
Regular algorithm updates to improve analysis accuracy
Offline capabilities for core features and favorite products
Optimized performance for fast scanning and data retrieval

legal.title: Legal and Compliance
items: Developer: Was2Eat Team
App Name: Was2Eat (was2eat-frontend)
Copyright: Â© 2024 Was2Eat. All rights reserved.
Registered in Estonia
Business Address: Sepapaja tn 6, 15551 Tallinn, Harju Maakond, Estonia
Support Contact: info@was2eat.com
Fully compliant with GDPR and international data protection laws
Regular security audits and privacy assessments

joinCommunity.title: Join Our Community
items: Connect with health-conscious users worldwide
Share your favorite healthy product discoveries
Get tips and advice from nutrition enthusiasts
Participate in challenges and community events
Help others make better food choices
Stay motivated on your health journey together

contribute.title: Contribute to Was2Eat
items: Report missing products to help expand our database
Submit product photos and information
Provide feedback on nutrition analysis accuracy
Suggest new features and improvements
Help translate the app into new languages
Share Was2Eat with friends and family

socialMedia.title: Follow Us on Social Media
items: Instagram: @was2eat - Daily nutrition tips and product highlights
Twitter: @was2eat - Latest updates and community discussions
Facebook: Was2Eat Community - Join our growing community
LinkedIn: Was2Eat - Professional updates and partnerships
YouTube: Was2Eat Channel - Educational content and tutorials
TikTok: @was2eat - Quick tips and product reviews

support.title: Community Support
items: Help fellow users with product questions
Share your knowledge about nutrition and health
Report inappropriate content or behavior
Mentor new users getting started with the app
Organize local meetups and events
Contact info@was2eat.com for community guidelines

recognition.title: Community Recognition
items: Top contributors featured in our monthly newsletter
Special badges for active community members
Early access to new features and updates
Invitation to exclusive community events
Recognition in our social media channels
Opportunity to influence product development
